attributes.action: employ all the teachers who have just completed their probationer year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is supposed to be a lack of teachers yet hundreds  face unemployment after their probationer year due to lack of investment in schools to employ them.The government is failing our teachers and our children by not employing ready qualified teachers for the 10,000 posts they are now saying they want.
